turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi there.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you help me with putting in a pizza order in to Bele Luna?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i sure can.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what do you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like three small pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On the first one, I want sausage and onions.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On the second one, I would like mushrooms and onions.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And on the third one, I would like a veggie lover's pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, you said you want 3 small pizzas, 1 with sausage and onions, 1 mushroom and onions, and 1 veggie lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did i get that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, you did.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $37.89 is the total. should i place the order for you now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: at No. Could you also make sure it has gluten-free crust on it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want gluten free crust for all 3 pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. let me read the order to you once more to confirm. 3 small pizzas, 1 with sausage and onions, 1 mushroom and onions, and 1 veggie lovers, all with gluten free crust.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $37.89 is the total. should i place the order for you now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, your order's been placed. it'll be ready for pick up in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need help with anything else today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that was it. Thank you so much for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're very welcome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: enjoy that pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
